code: import*as SplashScreen from'expo-splash-screen';import React from'react';export default class AppLoading extends React.Component{static defaultProps={autoHideSplash:true};constructor(props){super(props);SplashScreen.preventAutoHideAsync();}componentWillUnmount(){if(this.props.autoHideSplash===false){return;}if(global.__E2E__){SplashScreen.hideAsync();}else{setTimeout(SplashScreen.hideAsync,200);}}render(){return null;}}
